answers.answer: Oh yeah!  My feet are about twice their normal size.  I'm so glad that I'm preggo in the summer because I can only wear sandals and flip flops.  Doc says that my blood pressure is fine and isn't concerned.  I will say that since I was put on bedrest/disability, my feet aren't as bad.
Same here! My feet have been swollen the past few days, mainly because of the heat...

I don't have a single swollen spot on my body, except my belly =) but every time I go to either of my drs and only when I see them does my bp become high... They all think I will have preeclampsia before Bryce gets here but I think I'm fine... We will see, sorry you guys are swollen...
I'm glad you're not swollen! :) Hopefully the BP doesn't become an issue...good luck!

question: I took a picture this is my leg after I pushed on it with my thumb...Blood pressure is good...anyone else?
title: Swelling
